org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3

Class DFSClientCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3.DFSClientCache

  •  class DFSClientCache
extends Object
    A cache saves DFSClient objects for different users

        Parameters:
